personal.title: Album Poster Generator
personal.shortDescription: Generate cool album posters using the Spotify API
description: This is a website to generate a cool album poster. It interacts with the Spotify API for all of the album data.
It will take an album and generate a poster with the album artwork, tracklist, and other metadata beautifully arranged.

personal.title: LiDAR Lense
personal.shortDescription: iPhone app using LiDAR to map obstacles in real-time
description: My iPhone app that uses the LiDAR on some iPhone Pro models to help map the room around you.
It identifies potential obstacles and displays them on the screen for the user as they walk around in real time.
Written in Swift and Python, the repository is currently private.

personal.title: Image Lab
personal.shortDescription: Fast browser-based image editor with advanced features
description: Image Lab is a fast, browser-based image editor with a Python (Flask) backend.
It supports cropping, resizing, color adjustments, filters, background removal, histogram equalization, and content-aware seam carving.
The seam carving feature allows for intelligent resizing that preserves important content in images. See my academic project on seam carving for more info.

personal.title: Taylor Series Visualizer
personal.shortDescription: Browser Based Tool for visualizing Taylor Series
description: This site lets you visualize Taylor series approximations of a function in real time, showing the original curve alongside its polynomial as you adjust the expansion point and order.
It includes interactive plotting with error visualization, so you can see exactly where and how the approximation diverges as you move away from the center.
The interface also generates the corresponding LaTeX for both the general Taylor form and the expanded polynomial, with quick copy support for notes or reports.

personal.title: Swears in Songs
personal.shortDescription: Find all the swear words in any song
description: This is a website to return all of the swear words in a queried song.
My first website so a little rough around the edges, still gets the job done though.
The original website may still be at: https://trevorg73.web.illinois.edu/songswears

personal.title: Music Aggregator for DJing
personal.shortDescription: Download Spotify playlists as tagged MP3s for DJ software
description: This is a GUI I wrote that will take in a Spotify playlist and download that playlist as a series of MP3s, all tagged with standard ID3 tags.
This makes importing into DJ software, such as Serato, trivial.
It is highly parallelized, being able to support downloading 6 playlists at a time.

personal.title: Clarence
personal.shortDescription: Feature-rich Discord bot with music, trivia, and more
description: My first ever Discord bot! Built using discord.py, it was incredibly janky at first but now is refined and was a good learning experience.
It now has a wide range of features including music playback, trivia games, image manipulation, and more, spanning over 70 commands.
He is named Clarence, and is Clarice's brother

personal.title: TI Calculator Programs
personal.shortDescription: Collection of programs written for TI-84 calculators
description: I am a huge proponent of learning to code as early as possible, and I think the best and most accessible way to start is through a calculator!
These are all of the programs that have some amount of value that I wrote on my TI-84+ over the years.

personal.title: This Website!
personal.shortDescription: My portfolio website built with Flask
description: A website to show off all of my projects and introduce myself.
It is written with Flask and is hosted on Railway.
Features include city-themed backgrounds, dynamic project pages, and a lyrics footer.

personal.title: www.peytonbaisden.com
personal.shortDescription: A complete portfolio website for my brother
description: A personal website for my brother to help in his comedy career
It is written with Flask and is hosted on Railway.
Features some intense css and javascript with dyanmically generated html.

personal.title: Mario Kart Tracker
personal.shortDescription: Track Mario Kart placements for you and your friends
description: Enter in a username and this site will track as many friends as you want, and all of their Mario Kart placements.
They are saved under your username for easy access later.

personal.title: Clarice
personal.shortDescription: A chess bot I made to help me practice
description: A chess bot that I built with the help of Claude to help me practice the openings I play in chess
Plays moves based on random seeding from the masters database, and then plays a user set stockfish level after the opening book hit its limit
Named Clarice as she is Clarence's sister

academic.title: First Person View Drone
academic.shortDescription: Senior design project with live wireless camera transmission
description: Senior design project for ECE at Illinois. 3 custom designed PCBs used to implement live wireless camera transmission from a Crazyflie drone to a headset.
Done in a group of 3. The final drone successfully streamed real time video to both a laptop and a headset.
The project involved designing camera, transmitter, and receiver boards, as well as integrating them with the existing Crazyflie platform.

academic.title: Six Degrees of Wikipedia Solver
academic.shortDescription: Solve the six degrees of Wikipedia problem with graph algorithms
description: A program to solve the six degrees of Wikipedia problem, which states that any Wikipedia article can be reached from any other in 6 clicks or less.
It was a final project, done in a group of 4.
It also goes into the betweenness centrality of thousands of articles, analyzing which articles serve as important connectors in the Wikipedia link graph.

academic.title: Custom Video Game on FPGA
academic.shortDescription: Top-down game about ECE life programmed on an FPGA
description: A custom video game programmed onto an FPGA detailing the life of an ECE major @ U of I.
Written in System Verilog it includes custom sprites and top down gameplay.
The repository is currently private.

academic.title: Controlled Boost Converter
academic.shortDescription: Hand-controlled boost converter with custom inductor
description: A hand-controlled boost converter designed for a ranging 9-15V input, and a strict 24VÂ±3% output.
A custom inductor was wound for the project.
Arduino control was also built in for more precise control.

academic.title: Demonstration of Seam Carving using Manim
academic.shortDescription: Educational video explaining seam carving algorithm
description: A final project in my Image Engineering class where I use the community version of Manim to explain in detail how seam carving works.
The video walks through the algorithm step by step, showing how the energy function and dynamic programming work together.
I didn't have a good microphone so the audio is not great.
